string:
On one cold
winter day, I
was waiting for
the bus so I
could go home.

Becuase of the
heavy snow, the
bus was late. As
soon as the door
opened, I jumped
on it.

It was getting
dark and the
bus headed deep
into the
mountains. After
several stops…

An old man got
off the bus.

However, after
he got off the
bus, it didn't
start moving.

“Mr. Driver, why
don't you take
off?”
The driver said,
“We are in the
mountains and
it's so dark
around here…”

“I want to use
the headlights
to make sure the
old man gets
home safely.”
